reviewText: What else is there to say really.  Phony baloney all-image no substance magic is not magic.  Just remove the 'mind' from 'mind freak' and you got 'Chris Angel freak'.  One star since zero stars are not an allowed option.
summary: Chris Angel did to magic what glam rock did to music

reviewText: Recieved in the mail last week, Although I have watched the entire season as it was realeased on A&E; it was great having this on DVD because of the bonus feature which is Criss teaching you how to do a couple of tricks (for those wondering, yes its different tricks that come with Mindfreak Ultimate Magic Kit by Criss Angel& Criss Angel MindFreak Platinum Magic Kit w/ Instructional DVDso your not getting jipped!) I loved every epsiode and i cant wait for Season 7!-John Madigan

reviewText: Magic as an art form is dead and Chris Angel is the living proof of that.  All of Chris's tricks are staged.  All the people that act so amazed are part of the act.  On a side note, Chris is so annoying to watch I can't get through 10 minutes before I want him to disappear.  It's so sad because I love magic, and the fact that this hack can become so famous tells me the art form is dead.
summary: Chris is a fake and too cheesy for my taste
